item.description:
On Thursday, November 8, at 7:15 pm, The Disproof Atheism Society will present "H. L. Mencken on God and Religion," an open and critical discussion, based in part on www.skeptic.ca/mencken_on_religion.htm and www.positiveatheism.org/hist/quotes/mencken.htm.

Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to all. Info: info@disproofatheism.org.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society: "“H. L. Mencken on God and Religion"
